Description:
Position Title:              BIM ManagerEmployment Type:      Full TimeSalary:                         up to 35K AED all-inclusive, depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:             Dubai, UAE About the Client:One of the leading Consulting firms, based in Dubai, with proven capabilities of successful project completions with high rate of customer satifaction Job Description:Set up overall BIM protocol, implement to the team as company SOP to consistently practice across all projects following company approved standards
Create, update each phase and manager BIM Model based on projects on hand
Supervise and control quality of the production and LaD stages
Review and verify the quality of BIM deliverables to maintain project standards, accuracy, and completeness of information in models for each project
Conduct regular health check-ups on project phases ensuring compliance with relevant regulations and codesSkills
Skills:
40 years old and below
Bachelor’s Degree in Architectural Engineering / Architecture; Master’s Degree is a plus
At least 10 years of experience in related role
Must be Certified professional in Revit and BIM implementation
Must have knowledge of Revit, ArchiCAD, Bentley BIM latest global standards (eg. ISO19650) and other related software's (such as AutoCAD, Sketch-Up, Rhino, Dynamo) and industry best practices
Should have experience in management of BIM of large scale residential, commercial, hospitality projects
Immediate joiners or with maximum 1 month notice will be prioritized
